treatments_requested.name: Genetic Testing
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Genetic tests on two dates of service

guidelines_details: Genetic testing of APOE may be considered for inheritance risk assessment among children but not for treatment outcome guidance for carriers.
soc_details: Genetic testing does not provide treatment outcome guidance for carriers without inheritance risk.

study_details.key_findings: Genetic testing of APOE may be considered for inheritance risk assessment among children but not for treatment outcome guidance for carriers.

rationale: The genetic tests performed were not likely to be more beneficial for evaluation of the patient’s medical condition than any available standard therapy. No risk of inheritance was noted, and the tests do not provide treatment outcome guidance for carriers.
reviewer_credentials: Three physician reviewers, all board certified in neurology, with one having sub-specialty certification in pain medicine. All are actively practicing and experts in the treatment of the enrollee’s medical condition.
